text: A Child's Garden of Verses is a book of poems by Robert Louis Stevenson. It was published in 1885. The book's subject is childhood. Well-known poems include "My Shadow", "The Swing", and "The Land of Counterpane". ==Other websites== * "A Child's Garden of Verses" at Bartleby.com Category:1880s books Category:Books by Robert Louis Stevenson Category:19th-century British poems Category:British children's books Category:1880s poems
title: A Child's Garden of Verses
